attributes.action: enforce local councils, housing associations and private landlords to build family sized, wheelchair accessible, bungalows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Said homes should be at least three bedrooms, taking into account the human right of being allowed to have children and partners. Also to enforce said landlords to update those homes currently occupied by people with disabilities as they do other homes, for example the decent homes scheme excludes people with disabilities. This is discrimination.
